author: Jason Lemon
title: GOP Governor Criticizes Trump for Encouraging State Protests Against Stay-at-Home Orders: 'It Just Doesn't Make Any Sense'
description: "We're sending completely conflicting messages out to the governors and to the people, as if we should ignore federal policy and federal recommendations," Governor Larry Hogan of Maryland said.
content: Maryland's Governor Larry Hogan questioned the logic of President Donald Trump encouraging demonstrations against stringent "stay-at-home" and "shelter-in-place" orders in several states, noting that the demonstrators were essentially protesting guidelines pu… [+3172 chars]
